other_tests.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CBD measures 4 mm. No evidence of stones or gallbladder wall thickening. The imaged portion of the pancreas appears within normal limits, without masses or pancreatic ductal dilation. Normal echogenicity of the spleen, measuring 9.4 cm. The right kidney measures 12.4 cm and the left kidney measures 11.8 cm, with normal cortical echogenicity and corticomedullary differentiation bilaterally. No evidence of masses, stones, or hydronephrosis in the kidneys. Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
